ðŸ“– Summary: Prompt2Flutter is a proof-of-concept project that uses AI, specifically Google's Gemini model, to convert natural language descriptions into fully functional Flutter applications. It aims to automate the process of Flutter app development by generating code, managing dependencies, and creating UI components based on user input.
